text: Usale timro lagi murda janavara ra ragata ra sungurako masu harama (varjita) gareko cha ra juna kurama allaha baheka kunai an'yako nama pukarincha tara ho (tyasa avastha baheka) yadi kohi badhya huncha tara yasa sartama matra ki u svayam tyasako icchuka nahos ra simabhanda agadi jana nakhojos, ta nihsandeha allaha ksamadata ra dayavana cha
